page.title: 08Entertainments
page.content: In the home there are quite a few Entertainments like listening to the radio, computers if you have one,and video games ,TV and lots of other things.Some people go to places further away like Derngate Centre and the A.B.C. cinema in Northampton.Some people like to vist Wickstead Park and zoo's and other places.In the village we have several organisations. These are; Youth club, Gymnastics for the younger ones,Bingo for the elderlies, cubs,scouts,Boys Brigade,Girls Brigade, Brownies,Girl Guides and Rangers.We have a Playing field with swings,a slide,a climbing frame,monkey bars ,and two barrels.A lot of teenagers just wander around the village or go to town because they have nothing to do. Zoe Edwards aged 10. .
